Name: Farmer's Field
Description: There are rows of corn here, with giant rats hiding between them.

Name: Farmer's House
Description: This is the house of your neighbor, Per-Olsson.

Name: Trading Shop
Description: The shop of Sussie, the trader.

Name: Town Gate
Description: There is a gate here, protecting the town from unimaginable horrors. There's a rumour about a secret passage that leads to a long forgotten dungeon..'

Name: Spider Forest
Description: The trees in this forest are covered with spider webs.

Name: Herbalist's Hut
Description: You see a small hut, with legal plants drying from the roof.

Name: Herbalist's Garden
Description: There are many plants here, with snakes hiding behind them.
